questions.text: In what venue does Mirabelle Buttersfield (Claire Danes) first meet Jeremy Kraft (Jason Schwartzman)?
questions.explanation:
a laundromat.

	Neither Mirabelle nor Jeremy makes much money, so it's not a big surprise that they both make use of the local laundromat.

questions.text: Mirabelle, the titular shopgirl, works at Sak's Fifth Avenue.  What does she sell?
questions.explanation:
gloves.

	Mirabelle spends her days working at the gloves counter.  This is where she meets Ray Porter for the first time.

questions.text: Jeremy Kraft is an artist, and also a salesman of sorts.  What kind of equipment does he help to design and sell?
questions.explanation:
amplifiers.

	Jeremy is quite passionate about the amplifiers that he is tasked to sell to musicians.  He also designed the logo that gets stencilled onto each amplifier.

questions.text: On her first date with Ray Porter (Steve Martin), Mirabelle asks what he does for a living.  What is Ray's profession?
questions.explanation:
logician.

	Ray is clearly the owner of several profitable businesses, but at heart, he is a logician, a fact that Mirabelle doesn't quite get, at first.

questions.text: Most of the events of this film take place in Los Angeles, but Mirabelle is not a California native.  In what state did she grow up?
questions.explanation:
Vermont.

	Mirabelle tells Ray that she is from Vermont...and at one point in the film, she returns to her home state to visit her parents.

questions.text: Ray Porter's "home office" is not in Los Angeles.  Where is it?
questions.explanation:
Seattle, WA.

	It is during a visit to Ray's Seattle office that he cheats on Mirabelle for the first time.

questions.text: Lisa Cramer (Bridgette Wilson), Mirabelle's co-worker at Sak's, winds up sleeping with Jeremy thanks to a case of mistaken identity.  What does Lisa sell at Sak's Fifth Avenue?
questions.explanation:
perfume.

	Lisa notices that Mirabelle has bagged a rich man by way of the gloves counter, and schemes to steal Ray Porter from her.  Little does Lisa know that she is actually wooing Jeremy Kraft, who is anything but wealthy.

questions.text: Late in the film, Mirabelle quits her job at Sak's Fifth Avenue.  Where does she wind up working?
questions.explanation:
an art gallery.

	Mirabelle, an artist herself, winds up working the reception desk for an art gallery.  By the end of the film, she even gets a show of her own work featured there.

questions.text: Jeremy Kraft goes on the road with a band on tour.  What is the name of this band?
questions.explanation:
Hot Tears Band.

	Jeremy spends several months on tour with the Hot Tears Band.  It is during this trip that he gets into self-help books and books-on-tape, and works on making himself a better partner for Mirabelle.

questions.text: Which statement best sums up Mirabelle's situation, by the end of the film?
options: She is with a man whose name we never learn
questions.explanation:
She is with Jeremy.

	Mirabelle winds up in a relationship with Jeremy, after her affair with Ray Porter has come to a bitter end.
